allProducts.title: Coconut Sweetners
allProducts.description: Unrefined, minimally processed, low glycemic and rich in essential minerals and amino acid, our Coconut Sugars offer incredibly delicious and better-for-you 1:1 replacements to cane sugar.

allProducts.title: Sauces and Marinades
allProducts.description: Soy-free, gluten-free, refined sugar-free, with less sodium than soy sauce and Whole30 Approved, these tasty better-for-you seasoning sauces and marinades elevate any dish!

organic_sweetners.title: ORGANIC COCONUT SUGAR
organic_sweetners.details: Unrefined, low glycemic and rich in essential nutrients, our Brown Coconut Sugar is rooted in tradition. Minimally processed using the same ancient methods that are passed down generation to generation. Offers an incredibly delicious and better-for-you 1:1 replacement to cane sugar.
organic_sweetners.flavor_desc: Round and rich with hints of warm caramel and molasses.
organic_sweetners.ingre_desc: Certified Organic Fair Trade Granulated Coconut Blossom Nectar.
organic_sweetners.uses_desc: Makes for a healthy swap by using Coconut Sugar in place of conventional brown cane sugar.

organic_sweetners.title: ORGANIC GOLDEN COCONUT SUGAR
organic_sweetners.details: The FIRST and ONLY better-for-you sweetener that is 1 to 1 replacement for white cane sugar. Finer crystals for instant dissolvability, cleaner taste to achieve the ideal sweetness, and lighter color for perfect mixability!
organic_sweetners.flavor_desc: With a light and clean taste, our Golden Coconut Sugar is a better-for-you upgrade to white cane sugar.
organic_sweetners.ingre_desc: Certified Organic Fair Trade Granulated Coconut Blossom Nectar.
organic_sweetners.uses_desc: Finer crystals that dissolve quickly in drinks and blend well in recipes.

organic_sweetners.title: ORGANIC VANILLA COCONUT SUGAR
organic_sweetners.details: Rich and aromatic, our Organic Vanilla Coconut Sugar ups the indulgence factor of everything it touches. Always low glycemic, it’s also unrefined, naturally gluten-free and simply delicious.
organic_sweetners.flavor_desc: Rich and aromatic, with a velvety touch of pure vanilla bean, our Organic Vanilla Coconut Sugar gently deepens the savor of baked treats and adds sweetness to coffee and tea!
organic_sweetners.ingre_desc: Certified Organic Fair Trade Granulated Coconut Blossom Nectar.
organic_sweetners.uses_desc: Level up baked goods and sweet treats with Vanilla Coconut Sugar.

recipes.title: Shakshuka with Organic Original Lite Coco Aminos
direction: 1. Heat oil in large pan over medium-low heat then sauté onion and bell pepper 5-7 minutes until the onion is translucent and lightly golden.
2. Add garlic and spices to pan and cook, stirring constantly another minute to toast.
3. Add tomatoes, Big Tree Farms, and pepper to pan then smash tomatoes using a large spoon. Simmer 5 minutes.
4. Use large spoon to make 6 wells in the sauce and gently crack eggs into each. Season eggs with sea salt and more pepper to taste.
5. Cover pan and let cook 4-8 minutes until eggs are cooked the way you like them!

direction.one: 1. Put 2 serving bowls in the freezer.
direction.two: 2. Add all ingredients to a high-speed blender. Blend, starting on low and increasing to high, using the tamper to press the ingredients down into the blades. Begin with ¼ cup dairy-free milk and increase one tablespoon at a time as necessary (be careful not to add too much or you’ll end up with a smoothie, not a thick acai bowl).
direction.three: 3. Immediately divide the acai mixture into chilled bowls and garnish with your favorite toppings! We suggest fresh fruit, granola, and coconut flakes!

direction.one: 1. Preheat oven to 250°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
direction.two: 2. Add Golden Coconut Sugar and water to a small saucepan over low heat, careful not to burn. Stir until the sugar is dissolved and remove from heat.
direction.three: 3. Add the oats, nuts, cinnamon, and salt to a large mixing bowl. Pour in the melted sugar and mix well.
direction.four: 4. Spread the mixture onto prepared baking sheet in a smooth, even layer and bake for 30 minutes. Remove from oven and mix in dried cranberries and lemon zest. Set aside to cool.
direction.five: 5. Meanwhile, prepare your muffins. Increase oven to 350°F and line or lightly grease a muffin tin.

direction.one: 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. Line two baking sheets with parchment paper.
direction.two: 2. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, baking soda, and sea salt.
direction.three: 3. Pour the melted butter or coconut oil into a separate large bowl and whisk in coconut sugar until combined. Add egg and vanilla then whisk until combined.
direction.four: 4. Add in 4 oz. of chocolate and mix until just combined.
direction.five: 5. Wrap the dough in plastic wrap and refrigerate for 20 minutes to overnight. Cooler dough will result in thicker cookies! (If you chill overnight, allow the dough to sit at room temperature just long enough so that you can scoop it, and add 2-3 minutes to the total baking time.)

recipes.title: Veggie Stir Fry with Original Coco Aminos

direction.one: 1. Cook ramen noodles until al dente according to package instructions, drain, and set aside.
direction.two: 2. Meanwhile boil broccoli 3-4 minutes until al-dente then scoop out of water using a slotted spoon.
direction.three: 3. In the same water, boil carrots 1-2 minutes until tender, then strain and set aside.
direction.four: 4. Heat oil in a large pan or wok over medium-high heat. Add garlic, onion, and beech mushrooms and sauté until tender and lightly golden.
direction.five: 5. Add bell peppers and sauté another 3-5 minutes until fork tender

sauces.title: ORGANIC ORIGINAL COCO AMINOS
sauces.desc: Warmly umami with a touch of salt and sweet, coco aminos add pure savor to snacks and mains. Soy-free, gluten-free and less sodium than regular soy sauce. Say good-bye to soy sauce and hello goodness!
sauces.flavor_desc: Warmly umami with a touch of salt and sweet, coco aminos add pure savor to snacks and mains. Dash, dip, and dig in.
sauces.ingre_desc: Organic Coconut Blossom Nectar, Water, Balinese Sea Salt
sauces.uses_desc: A less sodium, soy-free, gluten-free alternative to soy sauce.

sauces.title: ORGANIC SOY-FREE TERIYAKI
sauces.desc: Our Teriyaki Marinade, crafted with Coco Aminos, is your secret sauce to elevate meals from so-so to TERI-iffic. Everything you love about sweet-savory teriyaki sauce, made without soy, gluten and any refined sugar. Ready, set, pour!
sauces.flavor_desc: Crafted with sweet raisin juice, soulful sesame, and a kick of ginger, this marinade is to be enjoyed straight from the bottle.
sauces.ingre_desc: Coco Aminos* (Coconut Blossom Nectar*, Water, Balinese Sea Salt), Raisin Juice Concentrate*, Sesame Oil*, Ginger Extract*. (*Organic)
sauces.uses_desc: The TERI-iffic sauce you need to upgrade everything from marinades to stir-fry to grilled veggies/meats

sauces.title: ORGANIC ORIGINAL LITE
sauces.desc: All the warm, bold umami flavors notes and with 34% less sodium and 50% fewer calories than our Original Coco Aminos. Add a dash and elevate your favorite snack and mains!
sauces.flavor_desc: Warmly umami with 34% less sodium and 50% fewer calories than our Original Coco Aminos.
sauces.ingre_desc: Filtered Water, Coconut Aminos* (Coconut Blossom Nectar*, Water, Balinese Sea Salt), Rice Vinegar*, Sea Salt, Yeast Extract*, Xanthan Gum. *Organic
sauces.uses_desc: Enjoy a better-for-you seasoning sauce in place of traditional soy sauce.

sauces.title: ORGANIC SOY-FREE PONZU
sauces.desc: Citrusy tang with the right amount of sweet and heat, use as a marinade for seafood, meats, and veggies, or simply as a delicious dipping sauce. Made without soy, gluten, and refined sugars, it’s the better-for-you version of the classic Japanese marinade!
sauces.flavor_desc: A delicious blend of our savory coco aminos followed with a kicking ensemble of spiciness that will leave you wanting more.
sauces.ingre_desc: Coconut Aminos* (Coconut Blossom Nectar*, Water, Sea Salt), Rasin Juice Concentrate*, Distilled Vinegar*, Contains 2% Or Less Of Cayenne Pepper*, Jalapeno Pepper*, Natural Flavors. (*Organic)
sauces.uses_desc: Soy-Free Ponzu is the perfect topper for poke bowls, as a marinade for seafood, meats, and veggies, or simply as a delicious dipping sauce.

sauces.title: ORGANIC CLASSIC SRIRACHA
sauces.desc: Turn up the heat with Sriracha Coco Aminos. A delicious blend of our savory coco aminos followed with a kicking ensemble of spiciness that will leave you wanting more. Made soy free, gluten free, refined sugar free, Sriracha Coco Aminos is the superstar of your meal!
sauces.flavor_desc: A delicious blend of our savory coco aminos followed with a kicking ensemble of spiciness that will leave you wanting more.
sauces.ingre_desc: Coconut Aminos* (Coconut Blossom Nectar*, Water, Sea Salt), Rasin Juice Concentrate*, Distilled Vinegar*, Contains 2% Or Less Of Cayenne Pepper*, Jalapeno Pepper*, Natural Flavors. (*Organic)
sauces.uses_desc: A unique blend of savory and spicy that will kick up the flavor of any dish from eggs to stir fry and beyond.

sauces.title: ORGANIC GINGERY LIME
sauces.desc: Fresh lime and zesty ginger pair to add an instant kick to any dish that craves a twist. Crafted with our Coco Aminos, this tasty sauce is always soy-free, gluten-free and refined sugar-free. Simply splash up an island escape.
sauces.flavor_desc: Tangy lime and spicy ginger are a match made for stir fry, but this brisk burst of flavor adds an instant kick.
sauces.ingre_desc: Coco Aminos* (Coconut Blossom Nectar*, Water, Balinese Sea Salt), Lime Juice Concentrate*, Organic Flavors*. (*Organic)
sauces.uses_desc: From salads to fish to stir-fry, Gingery Lime Coco Aminos has no limits!

sauces.title: ORGANIC TANGY BBQ
sauces.desc: With hints of chipotle and tamarind our Tangy BBQ Coco Aminos give a slightly smoky, perfectly peppery zest to everything grilled. Boost your barbecue, rev your roast and let the chef be complimented.
sauces.flavor_desc: With hints of chipotle and tamarind, our Tangy BBQ Coco Aminos give a slightly smoky, perfectly peppery zest to everything grilled.
sauces.ingre_desc: Coco Aminos* (Coconut Blossom Nectar*, Water, Balinese Sea Salt), Apple Cider Vinegar*, Organic Flavors*, Tamarind Paste*, Natural Flavors, Citric Acid. (*Organic)
sauces.uses_desc: Grilling just got tastier, cleaner and healthier! Grab your favorite veggies, meats, and fire up the grill!
